channel.title: Rhett Reese on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Rhett Reese on jverkamp.com

item.title: Deadpool 2
item.description: language warning (duh?) Well that certainly started with a bang. After the surprsing (to some I suppose) success of Deadpool, of course they’re going to make another. It’s … pretty much exactly what you’d expect if you took Deadpool and turned it up to, well, as far as Cable’s gun goes. ðŸ˜„ We have more X-Men! Well, we have Yukio. And a delightful blink and you’ll miss it group cameo. And Cable!

item.title: Deadpool
item.description: language warning (duh?) Oh hey, Deadpool & Wolverine is out on streaming (and it’s been a while since I reviewed or even watched a movie). Let’s rewatch these! From the studio that inexplicably sewed his fucking mouth shut the first time comes five-time Academy Award viewer, Ryan Reynolds in an eHarmony date with destiny. Ladies and gentlemen, I give you… me! Deadpool. I… totally forgot that this movie starts with the highway shootout scene that made the demo reel.

item.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
item.description: It’s not every day that you get such a perfect example of sequelitis.
